fields.name: Encouraging Studded Leather
fields.desc: While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. In addition, each friendly creature within 10 feet of you that can see you gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws. If you are a paladin with the Aura of Courage feature, this bonus increases to +2.
